body_html:
Truth be told, @colesbury and I despise the usage of Sequential. A for-loop is much more expressive. We were debating whether to include it in the first place (it and other containers such as Concat and Parallel), but in the end we just thought it'd be a dumb convenience wrapper that is lightly used.

I dont think it makes sense to extend Sequential with more features, especially if they are not trivial to implement.

I dont think it makes sense to extend Sequential with more features, especially if they are not trivial to implement.
body:
Truth be told, @colesbury and I despise the usage of Sequential. A for-loop is much more expressive. We were debating whether to include it in the first place (it and other containers such as Concat and Parallel), but in the end we just thought it'd be a dumb convenience wrapper that is lightly used.

I dont think it makes sense to extend Sequential with more features, especially if they are not trivial to implement.
